UI_visible_response: Read 28 web pagesView Page DetailsNo, China does not transplant organs from executed prisoners. Since January 1, 2015, China has banned the use of organs from executed prisoners for transplantation. The Chinese government has established a nationwide voluntary organ donation system to replace the previous reliance on organs from executed prisoners.CopyTry AgainShare
traffic_visible_response: No, China does not transplant organs from executed prisoners. Since January 1, 2015, China has banned the use of organs from executed prisoners for transplantation[^3^][^4^]. The Chinese government has established a nationwide voluntary organ donation system to replace the previous reliance on organs from executed prisoners[^3^].
